title: Liquid Takes Control And We Return To Where It All Began! Part 4 of MGS4
description:
Barrett and Mike are back for more Metal Gear Solid 4! Honestly where could this story really go, it's already crazy and off the rails! But the journey must go on as we chase down liquid and try to put a stop to the system!
